week_overview: This week focuses on building your aerobic base with consistent easy runs and a foundational bodyweight strength session to support your running.

running_sessions.workout_description: An easy paced run to start the week, focusing on comfortable breathing and maintaining a conversational pace.
Another easy run, building up your weekly mileage. Concentrate on relaxed form and consistent effort.
Your weekly long run, crucial for developing endurance. Maintain a steady, comfortable pace throughout.
running_sessions.notes: Remember to fuel and hydrate adequately before and during your long run.

exercises.name: Bodyweight Squats
exercises.form_cues: Keep chest up, weight in heels, descend as if sitting in a chair.

exercises.name: Alternating Lunges
exercises.form_cues: Step forward, lower until both knees are bent at 90 degrees, keep front knee behind toes.

exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.form_cues: Maintain a straight line from head to heels, lower chest towards the floor.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.form_cues: Keep body in a straight line, engage core, don't let hips sag or rise too high.

exercises.name: Glute Bridges
exercises.form_cues: Lie on back, knees bent, feet flat. Lift hips off floor by squeezing glutes until body forms a straight line from shoulders to knees.

exercises.name: Bird-Dog
exercises.form_cues: Start on hands and knees, extend opposite arm and leg simultaneously, keeping core stable and back flat.
